    CONNIE variability

    2023-08-27

    04-coralseed-variance.Rmd

    First read in the seascape and the 100k files for Mermaid Bay

    Note: simulate.mortality=“none” needs fixing

    library(tidyverse)
library(doParallel)
library(foreach)
library(sf)
library(coralseed)
library(units)

seascape <- coralseed::seascape_probability(reefoutline=reef_map, habitat=benthic_map)

sim1_100k <- st_read("/Users/rof011/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-CSIRO/Data - SeaSims/conniemodels/run_day_12036_lizard_del_14_1512_sim1_100K_10.json")
    ## Reading layer `run_day_12036_lizard_del_14_1512_sim1_100K_10' from data source 
##   `/Users/rof011/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-CSIRO/Data - SeaSims/conniemodels/run_day_12036_lizard_del_14_1512_sim1_100K_10.json' 
##   using driver `GeoJSON'
## Simple feature collection with 6100000 features and 3 fields
## Geometry type: POINT
## Dimension:     XYZ
## Bounding box:  xmin: 145.4518 ymin: -14.67246 xmax: 145.4815 ymax: -14.64494
## z_range:       zmin: 2.7 zmax: 2.7
## Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
    sim_random <- sim1_100k |> filter(id %in% sample(0:99999, 1000))


output_single <- seed_particles(input = sim_random, seascape = seascape, 
                                set.centre = TRUE, format = "json", silent = TRUE, 
                                competency.function = "exponential",  
                                simulate.mortality = "typeI", simulate.mortality.n = 0)
